Sonic Execution Layer
We need a frontend where the data feed will be posted live

Steps
1. Create 15secs candles | Capture pool liquidity data
2. Define range at the open of 15secs candle, +- 0.1%
3. Distribution % of WETH & USDC
4. Open Position 
5. Monitor Positon: UP: Price > Upper Range, Down: Price < Down Range 
6. If Price > UP or Price < Down then rebalance
7. After rebalance open position on next 15secs candle

Data needed from API

1. Token: WETH/USDC
2. Amount: In WETH & USDC
3. Price data: 15sec Candles ( Open, High, Low, Close)
4. Current status: Position open, Waiting for Rebalance, Price out of range 
5. Type of Price out of range: UP or Down


Above is what my boss provided

This is what I am thinking as phase 1, 

Let us not use third party service like defilama or gekko terminal to get candle prices, there are various marketmaker bots out there which will do these stuff which will make  our data inconsistent because we are only targetting one pool address for now-

we need to focus on this pool (weth/usdc pool)
https://www.shadow.so/liquidity/0x6fb30f3fcb864d49cdff15061ed5c6adfee40b40



as far as I know this is the only official api for shadow dex-
https://api.shadow.so/mixed-pairs

I am hoping we may somehow filter with pool contract here which is id here, and hit it every 15 secs, then calculate price for in our own.

looking at above data for our weth/usdc pool, do you think we can calucate our locally price here

if yes then implement this


Steps
1. Create 15secs candles | Capture pool liquidity data
2. Define range at the open of 15secs candle, +- 0.1%
3. Distribution % of WETH & USDC
4. Open Position 
5. Monitor Positon: UP: Price > Upper Range, Down: Price < Down Range 
6. If Price > UP or Price < Down then rebalance (no txn, just use rebalanceA for up and rebalanceB for down)
7. After rebalance open position on next 15secs candle



for now we need to run this for hour and store this in csv and then plot a basic graph in simple frontend
